casebody.data:
Christian Weber, et al., Respondents v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 2, 1891. Appeal from a judgment entered upon the decision of the court at an equity term. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Sackett & Bennett, for respondents.

Before Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
